original: Jahnberg, Håkan, skådespelare, Göteborg, f. 11/9/03 i Sthlm. G. 37 m. skådesp. Berta Hall. Barn: Klas f. 39, Åse 44. — Teaterstud. f. bl. a. Karin Sv^anström o. Karin Alexandersson. Debut, på Hippodromteatern i Maltniö 29, eng. v. Lilila Teatern, v. Pauline Brunius, Nils Ekstams, Allan Rydings o. Anders Frithiofs turnéer, Riksteatern o. Folkparksteatern, anst. v. Stadsteatern i Gbg sed. 37. Bl. roller; Perukmakare Ström i Markurdls i Wadköping, Foldal i John Gabriel Borkman, Homer i Det ljusnar v. 7-tiden, Yank i Hjärtan o. njurar, Patrik Sinclair i Av hjärtans lust. Jakobsson, se Jacobsson.
translated: Jahnberg, Håkan, actor, Gothenburg, born September 11th, 1903 in Stockholm. Married in 1937 to actress Berta Hall. Children: Klas born in 1939 and Åse born in 1944. Studied theater with Karin Sv^anström and Karin Alexandersson. Debut at Hippodromteatern in Maltniö in 1929, then performed at Lilila Teatern with Pauline Brunius, Nils Ekstams, Allan Rydings and Anders Frithiofs tours, Riksteatern, Folkparksteatern, and has been employed at the Stadsteatern in Gothenburg since 1937. Notable roles include Perukmakare Ström in Markurdls in Wadköping, Foldal in John Gabriel Borkman, Homer in Det ljusnar v. 7-tiden, Yank in Hjärtan o. njurar, Patrik Sinclair in Av hjärtans lust. Note: Jakobsson is an alternate spelling of Jacobsson.
